body:
Concept ACK on removing no-longer  needed abstraction. [Currently failing to compile](https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5067477362147328?command=ci#L2464):
```bash
  CXX      wallet/libbitcoin_wallet_a-coincontrol.o
In file included from /usr/include/c++/9/bits/move.h:55,
                 from /usr/include/c++/9/bits/nested_exception.h:40,
                 from /usr/include/c++/9/exception:144,
                 from /usr/include/c++/9/new:40,
                 from /usr/include/c++/9/any:37,
                 from ./rpc/request.h:9,
                 from ./rpc/server.h:10,
                 from rpc/server.cpp:6:
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits: In instantiation of âstruct std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<JSONRPCRequest> > >â:
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:150:27:   required from âconstexpr const bool std::__and_v<std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<JSONRPCRequest> > >â
/usr/include/c++/9/any:192:27:   required by substitution of âtemplate<class _ValueType, class _Tp, class _Mgr, typename std::enable_if<__and_v<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp> > >, bool>::type <anonymous> > std::any::any(_ValueType&&) [with _ValueType = const JSONRPCRequest&; _Tp = JSONRPCRequest; _Mgr = std::any::_Manager_external<JSONRPCRequest>; typename std::enable_if<__and_v<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp> > >, bool>::type <anonymous> = <missing>]â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:883:12:   required from âstruct std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&>â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:901:12:   required from âstruct std::__is_copy_constructible_impl<JSONRPCRequest, true>â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:907:12:   required from âstruct std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:131:12:   required from âstruct std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>, std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&> >â
/usr/include/c++/9/any:181:58:   required by substitution of âtemplate<class _ValueType, class _Tp, class _Mgr, typename std::enable_if<std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >::value, bool>::type <anonymous>, typename std::enable_if<(! std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp>::value), bool>::type <anonymous> > std::any::any(_ValueType&&) [with _ValueType = const JSONRPCRequest&; _Tp = JSONRPCRequest; _Mgr = std::any::_Manager_external<JSONRPCRequest>; typename std::enable_if<std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >::value, bool>::type <anonymous> = <missing>; typename std::enable_if<(! std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp>::value), bool>::type <anonymous> = <missing>]â
rpc/server.cpp:91:32:   required from here
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:136:12: error: incomplete type âstd::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>â used in nested name specifier
  136 |     struct __and_<_B1, _B2, _B3, _Bn...>
      |            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits: In instantiation of âconstexpr const bool std::__and_v<std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<JSONRPCRequest> > >â:
/usr/include/c++/9/any:192:27:   required by substitution of âtemplate<class _ValueType, class _Tp, class _Mgr, typename std::enable_if<__and_v<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp> > >, bool>::type <anonymous> > std::any::any(_ValueType&&) [with _ValueType = const JSONRPCRequest&; _Tp = JSONRPCRequest; _Mgr = std::any::_Manager_external<JSONRPCRequest>; typename std::enable_if<__and_v<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp> > >, bool>::type <anonymous> = <missing>]â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:883:12:   required from âstruct std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&>â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:901:12:   required from âstruct std::__is_copy_constructible_impl<JSONRPCRequest, true>â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:907:12:   required from âstruct std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>â
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:131:12:   required from âstruct std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>, std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&> >â
/usr/include/c++/9/any:181:58:   required by substitution of âtemplate<class _ValueType, class _Tp, class _Mgr, typename std::enable_if<std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >::value, bool>::type <anonymous>, typename std::enable_if<(! std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp>::value), bool>::type <anonymous> > std::any::any(_ValueType&&) [with _ValueType = const JSONRPCRequest&; _Tp = JSONRPCRequest; _Mgr = std::any::_Manager_external<JSONRPCRequest>; typename std::enable_if<std::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<_Tp>, std::is_constructible<_Tp, _ValueType&&> >::value, bool>::type <anonymous> = <missing>; typename std::enable_if<(! std::__is_in_place_type<_Tp>::value), bool>::type <anonymous> = <missing>]â
rpc/server.cpp:91:32:   required from here
/usr/include/c++/9/type_traits:150:27: error: âvalueâ is not a member of âstd::__and_<std::is_copy_constructible<JSONRPCRequest>, std::__not_<std::is_constructible<JSONRPCRequest, const JSONRPCRequest&> >, std::__not_<std::__is_in_place_type<JSONRPCRequest> > >â
  150 |     inline constexpr bool __and_v = __and_<_Bn...>::value;
      |                           ^~~~~~~
make[2]: *** [Makefile:8807: rpc/libbitcoin_server_a-server.o] Error 1
```

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #21331 (rpc: replace wallet raw pointers with references (#18592 rebased) by fanquake)
* #21035 (Remove pointer cast in CRPCTable::dumpArgMap by ryanofsky)
* #21007 (bitcoind: Add -daemonwait option to wait for initialization by laanwj)
* #20286 (rpc: deprecate `addresses` and `reqSigs` from rpc outputs by mjdietzx)
* #10102 ([experimental] Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
